name: 女性文學
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大二大三大四修習
goals: 1.	透過閱讀女性文學，培養批判思考與精讀分析的能力
尊重多元差異，關心弱勢族群
運用所學之理論架構分析社會議題和個人經驗，並提升英語口語表達和寫作分析能力
syllabus:
**Tentative Weekly Schedule:**

_The instructor may make changes to the schedule before the beginning of the course._

**Introduction**

Week 1

Introduction to the course

Week 2

Introduction to feminism

Video: Chimamanda Adichie’s “The Danger of a Single Story”

_\*Give away self-introduction_

Week 3

Virginia Woolf’s _A Room of One’s Own_ excerpt

Introduction to close-reading

Week 4

Alice Walker’s “In Search of Our Mothers’ Gardens”

Gloria Anzaldúa’s “Speaking in Tongues”

Week 5

Uma Narayan’s “Undoing the ‘Package Picture’ of Cultures”

Ana Castillo’s “We Would Like You to Know”

Chrystos’s “I Am Not Your Princess”

**Body Image, Sexuality, Violence**

Week 6

Judith Cofer’s “The Story of My Body”

Abra Fortune Chernik’s “The Body Politic”

Week 7

Lynda Marín’s “Her Rites of Passage”

Caridad Souza’s “Missing Body”

_\*group presentation prompt provided_

Week 8

Ursula Le Guin’s “The Ones Who Walk Away from Omelas”

_\*Group presentation collaboration_

**Midterms**

Week 9

Midterm Part 1: Group bridging map presentation

_\*Individual written midterm review provided_

Week 10

Midterm Part 2: Individual written exam

**Rethinking the Gendered Body**

Week 11

Lois Gould’s “X: A Fabulous Child’s Story”

**Body with Illness**

Week 12

Charlotte Perkins Gilman’s “The Yellow Wallpaper”

Charlotte Perkins Gilman’s “Why I Wrote The Yellow Wallpaper”

Week 13

Gloria Anzaldúa’s “La Prieta”

_\*Final project prompt provided_

**Toward Healing**

Week 14

Selection from Linda Hogan’s Memoir Part 1

Week 15

Selection from Linda Hogan’s Memoir Part 2

_\*Healing gift activity_

**Final Project**

Week 16

Final project proposal and consultation

Week 17

Final project showcase and peer critique

Week 18

Final project due on Moodle

**_Course Requirement Overview:_**

*   (25%) Attendance and class participation
*   (25%) Midterm part 1: group bridging map presentation
*   (25%) Midterm part 2: individual written exam
*   (25%) Individual final project
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for sophomore, junior, senior
